wikipedia_page.main: Ewan McLean (born 11 September 1994 in Greenock) is a Scottish footballer who last played for Greenock Morton in the Scottish Championship.

response: Dylan McLaughlin and Ewan McLean were released.
He was released in August 2013, along with Ewan McLean. In September, he signed for Largs Thistle, managed by Morton youth coach Sandy MacLean.
